categories: Category:Events of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Bombing of the Pica Rim Pipeline

After the Imperial execution of Earnst Kamiel, the founder and leader of the Justice Action Network, on the date 36:10:4, the terrorist organization carried out a retaliatory strike on the Colonies astronomical object Albrae-Don. JAN detonated a series of bombs at the underwater monorail transit tube known as the Pica Rim Pipeline, rupturing and flooding a section of the tunnel.

The bombing of the Pica Rim Pipeline was first mentioned in the "Galaxywide NewsNets" feature of the West End Games' Star Wars Adventure Journal 10, which was written by Paul Sudlow and published in May 1996.
